example.eg: People join the police force in order to serve their community.
example.egtrans: 人们加入警察队伍是为了服务社区。

example.eg: The waiters served roast beef and mashed potatoes to the diners.
example.egtrans: 服务员们把烤牛肉和土豆泥提供给食客们。

example.eg: She served the children their food.
example.egtrans: 她给孩子们端上了食物。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 给…提供, 为…端上, 为…摆出

example.eg: The salesperson is serving another customer right now.
example.egtrans: 销售员现在正在接待另一名客人。

example.eg: Alfred served Bruce Wayne loyally.
example.egtrans: 阿尔弗莱德忠诚地服侍着布鲁斯·韦恩。

example.eg: He is serving a 10-year sentence for the crime.
example.egtrans: 他因为犯罪入狱，正在服十年徒刑。

example.eg: Yes, this particular screwdriver will serve me fine.
example.egtrans: 是的，这把螺丝刀能满足我的需要。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 满足...的需要, 实现...的需要

dsense.name: serve⇒
dsense.guideword: (tennis, etc.: play first) (乒乓球、网球等)

example.eg: Who serves next?  I think I do.
example.egtrans: 下一个谁发球?  我想该我了吧。

example.eg: He has been serving at that restaurant for two years.
example.egtrans: 他给那家餐厅当了两年的服务生了。

dsense.name: serve
dsense.guideword: (tennis, etc.: first stroke) (乒乓球、网球等)

example.eg: His serve was so fast that the opponent couldn't return it.
example.egtrans: 他球发得太快，对手接不住。

example.eg: He served loyally for many years.
example.egtrans: 他忠心耿耿地服务了多年。

example.eg: The sergeant has served for ten years.
I served as a medic for ten years.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 履行职责, 担任职务

example.eg: The altar boy has to serve on Sunday.
example.egtrans: 祭坛助手得在周日担任助祭。

example.eg: He served as the secretary for this meeting and took notes.
example.egtrans: 他担任本次会议的秘书，并做了记录。

example.eg: The office also serves as a guest bedroom.
The policeman served a summons to the witness.
Our company serves the Tri-State Area.
The bull serves all the cows on the farm.
His lawyer has just served me a summons.
She served the company well for twenty-five years.
example.egtrans: 她为这家公司工作了25年。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为…工作, 在…工作, 为…服务

example.eg: The lunch ladies in the cafeteria serve out the day's meal of meatballs.
Helen served up a delicious meal of chicken and roast potatoes.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 端上...的饭菜, 备了...的饭菜

example.eg: The company manufactures ready-to-serve food products.
The team's defeat serves as an example of what can happen if the players become complacent.
Lying would serve no purpose because the truth will come out later.
If you don't have a shovel to dig with, a sharp stick just might serve the purpose.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对于目标有用, 契合目的, 达到目的

example.eg: Jones had served time for a theft conviction.

dsense.name: serve your time
dsense.guideword: figurative (do unpleasant job) (比喻，指不喜欢的工作)

example.eg: After working there for 34 years I decided I'd served my time.
I'm not surprised the dog bit you, with the way you keep teasing him; it serves you right!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 报应不爽, 是..的报应

dsense.name: single-serve
dsense.guideword: (food, drink: containing one portion) (食物、饮料)

example.eg: For dessert we had soft serve ice cream in a cone.
